data.title: A
data.text:
Battlefield 1943 for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360

Battlefield Bad Company for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360

Battlefield Bad Company 2 for PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360

EA Play members, please note that we are removing these titles from The Play List on December 8, 2023

DiRT 4 - EA Play members, please note that we are removing DiRT 4 from The Play List on October 03, 2022

DiRT Rally - EA Play members, please note that we are removing DiRT Rally from The Play List on October 03, 2022

EA Access Subscribers please note that we will no longer be supporting the previous version of the EA Access Hub as of January 15, 2019. This will not affect EA Access subscription services. Players can get the newest version of the EA Access Hub in the Xbox store to continue receiving the latest games.

EA Access Subscribers please note that we are also removing FIFA 14 from the EA Access Vault on 18 October 2017. On this date, the game will no longer be available to download from the EA Access Hub. Players who have already downloaded FIFA 14 will still be able to load the game, but online features will be disabled.
